original: @76b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @76b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa tsinta sta bam /
analyzed: aa tsinta sta bam /
translated: Acintyastava

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Inconceivable

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: gang zhig dngos po rten 'byung rnams //
analyzed: gang zhig dngos po rten 'byung rnams //
translated: You have taught that dependently arisen things

original: ngo bo med pa @77a * //🔽nyid du gsungs //
analyzed: ngo bo med pa @77a * // nyid du gsungs //
translated: Are devoid of essence.

original: ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: ye shes mnyam med bsam mi khyab //
translated: Your wisdom is incomparable and inconceivable,

original: dpe med de la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽ji ltar khyod kyis theg chen la //
analyzed: dpe med de la phyag 'tshal lo // ji ltar khyod kyis theg chen la //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are beyond all analogies.🔽Just as you realized the selflessness of phenomena

original: nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs //🔽de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la //
analyzed: nyid kyis chos la bdag med rtogs // de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la //
translated: In the Great Vehicle yourself,🔽So you taught it to the wise

original: thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad //🔽rkyen rnams las ni 'brel 'byung ba //
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang gis bstan pa mdzad // rkyen rnams las ni 'brel 'byung ba //
translated: Out of compassion.🔽You have said that what arises in dependence on conditions

original: ma skyes lags par khyod kyis gsungs //
analyzed: ma skyes lags par khyod kyis gsungs //
translated: Is unborn.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis de ma skyes //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis de ma skyes //
translated: Since it is unborn by its very essence,

original: de phyir stong par rab tu bstan //🔽ji ltar 'di na sgra brten nas //
analyzed: de phyir stong par rab tu bstan // ji ltar 'di na sgra brten nas //
translated: You have taught it to be empty.

original: brag ca gun du 'byung ba ltar //
analyzed: brag ca gun du 'byung ba ltar //
translated: Just as an echo arises in dependence on a sound,

original: sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du yang //
analyzed: sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du yang //
translated: And a mirage arises in dependence on heat,

original: de bzhin srid pa kun du 'byung //
analyzed: de bzhin srid pa kun du 'byung //
translated: So too do all things of the world🔽Arise in dependence on ignorance.

original: sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // dri za'i grong khyer gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam gal te ma skyes na //
analyzed: sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // dri za'i grong khyer gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam gal te ma skyes na //
translated: cities of gandharvas, and reflections🔽were not unarisen,

original: mthong ba la sogs pa dpe med 'gyur //🔽ji ltar rgyu rkyen las byung ba //🔽de dag byas pa can du bzhed //
analyzed: mthong ba la sogs pa dpe med 'gyur // ji ltar rgyu rkyen las byung ba // de dag byas pa can du bzhed //
translated: then seeing and so on would be without examples.🔽Just as you accept that

original: de bzhin rkyen las byung ba kum //
analyzed: de bzhin rkyen las byung ba kum //
translated: what arises from causes and conditions is produced,

original: mgon po khyod kyis de ltar gsungs //
analyzed: mgon po khyod kyis de ltar gsungs //
translated: so you, O Protector, have said🔽that the aggregates arise from conditions.

original: byis pa gang dag ci brjod pa //
analyzed: byis pa gang dag ci brjod pa //
translated: Whatever is said by the childish

original: bgyis pa zhes bgyid de mchis te //
analyzed: bgyis pa zhes bgyid de mchis te //
translated: is said to be produced and so on,

original: chad pa stong pa 'dra ba lags //
analyzed: chad pa stong pa 'dra ba lags //
translated: but that is like a nihilistic view,

original: don bzhin ma lags rab tu bstan //
analyzed: don bzhin ma lags rab tu bstan //
translated: taught to be completely incorrect.

original: gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes //
analyzed: gang tshe byas pa'i dngos ma skyes //
translated: When a produced thing does not arise,

original: de tshe da ltar byung ba yi //
analyzed: de tshe da ltar byung ba yi //
translated: then what is present

original: gang zhig pas na 'das par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig pas na 'das par 'gyur //
translated: that would be past?

original: ma 'ongs pa yang ji ltar ltos //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa yang ji ltar ltos //
translated: How could the future be seen?

original: rang las dngos po skye ba med //🔽gzhan dang gnyis ka las ma yin //
analyzed: rang las dngos po skye ba med // gzhan dang gnyis ka las ma yin //
translated: Things do not arise from themselves,🔽nor from another, nor from both,

original: yod min med min yod med min //
analyzed: yod min med min yod med min //
translated: nor without cause.

original: de tshe gang las gzhan zhig 'byung //
analyzed: de tshe gang las gzhan zhig 'byung //
translated: Then from what else could they arise?

original: ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med //
analyzed: ma skyes pa la rang bzhin med //
translated: And what is not arisen is essenceless.

original: de phyir gang las kun du 'byung //
analyzed: de phyir gang las kun du 'byung //
translated: So from what could it arise?

original: rang bzhin dngos po med grub pas //
analyzed: rang bzhin dngos po med grub pas //
translated: Since the nonexistence of essence is established,

original: gzhan las kyang ni 'byung ba med //🔽rang nyid yod na gzhan yod 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan las kyang ni 'byung ba med // rang nyid yod na gzhan yod 'gyur //
translated: There is no arising from another.🔽If something existed inherently, then another could exist.

original: gzhan nyid yod na rang nyid yod //
analyzed: gzhan nyid yod na rang nyid yod //
translated: If another existed, then it would exist.

original: de dag ltos pa can du grub //
analyzed: de dag ltos pa can du grub //
translated: These are established as mutually dependent.

original: pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs //
analyzed: pha rol tshu rol bzhin du gsungs //
translated: It is like the case of the far and the near.

original: gang tshe ci la'ang mi ltos pa //
analyzed: gang tshe ci la'ang mi ltos pa //
translated: When something does not depend on anything else,

original: de tshe gang la gang zhig 'byung //
analyzed: de tshe gang la gang zhig 'byung //
translated: Then what and how could it arise?

original: gang tshe ring la mi ltos pa //
analyzed: gang tshe ring la mi ltos pa //
translated: When something does not depend on long,

original: de tshe thung sogs ga la mchis //
analyzed: de tshe thung sogs ga la mchis //
translated: How could it be short?

original: ji ltar gcig sogs ma mchis pa //
analyzed: ji ltar gcig sogs ma mchis pa //
translated: Just as there is no such thing as one,🔽So there is no such thing as many.

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs la sogs pa //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs la sogs pa //
translated: So too, the past and future,

original: nyon mongs rnams kyang de bzhin te //
analyzed: nyon mongs rnams kyang de bzhin te //
translated: And the afflictions, are not tenable.

original: yang dag log pa'ang rang las ci //
analyzed: yang dag log pa'ang rang las ci //
translated: What is right and what is wrong?

original: dngos gang rang las ma mchis na //
analyzed: dngos gang rang las ma mchis na //
translated: If things do not exist without depending on others,

original: de tshe thams cad ci zhig mchis //
analyzed: de tshe thams cad ci zhig mchis //
translated: Then what is there?

original: gzhan zhes brjod pa gang lags te //
analyzed: gzhan zhes brjod pa gang lags te //
translated: What is called “other”

original: rang gi rang bzhin med na min //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin med na min //
translated: Does not exist without its own nature.

original: gang tshe gzhan gyi dngos med pa //
analyzed: gang tshe gzhan gyi dngos med pa //
translated: When other things do not exist,

original: de tshe @77b dngos rnams rang bzhin med //
analyzed: de tshe @77b dngos rnams rang bzhin med //
translated: Things do not exist inherently.

original: de tshe gzhan dngos dngos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: de tshe gzhan dngos dngos 'dzin pa //
translated: When other things are apprehended as things,

original: don gyi theg pa ci zhig mchis //
analyzed: don gyi theg pa ci zhig mchis //
translated: What is the point of the vehicle?

original: gdong ma nyid nas mnyam gyur pa //
analyzed: gdong ma nyid nas mnyam gyur pa //
translated: From the very beginning, they are the same,

original: rang bzhin gis kyang mya ngan 'das //
analyzed: rang bzhin gis kyang mya ngan 'das //
translated: And naturally they are also nirvana.

original: yang dag par ni ma skyes lags //
analyzed: yang dag par ni ma skyes lags //
translated: They are not truly arisen.

original: de slad chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs //🔽blo ldan khyod kyis gzugs la sogs //
analyzed: de slad chos rnams khyod kyis gsungs // blo ldan khyod kyis gzugs la sogs //
translated: Therefore, you have taught the Dharma.🔽You, the wise one, have taught

original: ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa //🔽dbu ba chu bur sgyu la sogs //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa // dbu ba chu bur sgyu la sogs //
translated: That form and so forth are essenceless.🔽They are like foam, bubbles, and mirages,

original: smig rgyu chu shing 'dra ba lags //
analyzed: smig rgyu chu shing 'dra ba lags //
translated: Like mirages and plantain trees.

original: dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs te /
analyzed: dbang po rnams kyis gang dmigs te /
translated: If what is perceived by the senses

original: gal te yang dag mchis gyur na //
analyzed: gal te yang dag mchis gyur na //
translated: Were to exist in reality,

original: byis pas yang dag rig par 'gyur //
analyzed: byis pas yang dag rig par 'gyur //
translated: Then the childish would perceive reality.

original: gang tshe yang dag shes pas ci /
analyzed: gang tshe yang dag shes pas ci /
translated: What is the point of knowing reality?🔽You have taught that the senses are

original: dbang po rnams ni bems po dang // tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin dang // lung ma bstan pa nyid dang ni //
analyzed: dbang po rnams ni bems po dang // tshad ma nyid kyang ma yin dang // lung ma bstan pa nyid dang ni //
translated: Insentient, not valid cognitions, and neutral,

original: log par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs //
analyzed: log par yongs shes khyod kyis gsungs //
translated: And that they are wrongly known.

original: gang gis ci zhig ma rtogs pa //
analyzed: gang gis ci zhig ma rtogs pa //
translated: What is it that is not understood?

original: yang dag ji bzhin thugs chud nas //🔽des na 'jig rten mi shes pas //
analyzed: yang dag ji bzhin thugs chud nas // des na 'jig rten mi shes pas //
translated: You have realized the perfect truth,🔽And so you have said that the world

original: bsgribs pa zhes kyang khyod kyis gsungs //
analyzed: bsgribs pa zhes kyang khyod kyis gsungs //
translated: Is obscured by ignorance.

original: yod ces pa ni rtag par lta //
analyzed: yod ces pa ni rtag par lta //
translated: To say that things exist is to hold them as permanent,

original: med ces pa ni chad par lta //🔽des na mtha' gnyis bral ba yi //
analyzed: med ces pa ni chad par lta // des na mtha' gnyis bral ba yi //
translated: To say that they do not is to hold them as annihilated.🔽Therefore, you have taught the Dharma

original: chos de khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad //
analyzed: chos de khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad //
translated: Free from these two extremes.🔽And so you have said that phenomena

original: des na chos rnams mu bzhi dang // bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags //
analyzed: des na chos rnams mu bzhi dang // bral bar khyod kyis bka' stsal lags //
translated: Are free from the four extremes.

original: rnam shes bya ba'ang ma lags la //
analyzed: rnam shes bya ba'ang ma lags la //
translated: And yet, you have not said that consciousness🔽Is like a dream or an optical illusion,

original: rmi lam mig 'phrul las byung dang // zla gnyis la sogs mthong ba bzhin //🔽'gro ba 'byung ba de dngos su //
analyzed: rmi lam mig 'phrul las byung dang // zla gnyis la sogs mthong ba bzhin // 'gro ba 'byung ba de dngos su //
translated: Like the appearance of a double moon, and so on.🔽You have seen that the world

original: ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs //🔽ji ltar rgyu las rmi lam na //
analyzed: ma byung de bzhin khyod kyis gzigs // ji ltar rgyu las rmi lam na //
translated: Is neither real nor unreal.🔽Just as in a dream,

original: 'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du //
analyzed: 'byung ba mthong ba de bzhin du //
translated: You see the arising of things from causes,

original: dngos po thams cad 'byung ba bzhin //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad 'byung ba bzhin //
translated: So you have said that all things

original: 'jig pa'ang de bzhin bzhed pa lags //
analyzed: 'jig pa'ang de bzhin bzhed pa lags //
translated: Arise and cease in the same way.

original: de bzhin chags sogs sdug bsngal dang // 'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs //
analyzed: de bzhin chags sogs sdug bsngal dang // 'khor ba sdug bsngal kun nyon mongs //
translated: suffering, cyclic existence, and the afflictions,

original: tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa yang //
analyzed: tshogs rdzogs pa dang thar pa yang //
translated: The completion of the accumulations, and even liberation,

original: rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs //
analyzed: rmi lam 'dra bar khyod kyis gsungs //
translated: Are all like a dream.🔽Likewise, you have taught that birth and non-birth,

original: de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang // 'ongs pa dang ni song ba yang //
analyzed: de bzhin skyes dang ma skyes dang // 'ongs pa dang ni song ba yang //
translated: Coming and going,

original: de bzhin bcings grol ye shes la ;
analyzed: de bzhin bcings grol ye shes la ;
translated: And even bondage and liberation,

original: / gnyis 'dod yang dag rig ma lags //
analyzed: / gnyis 'dod yang dag rig ma lags //
translated: Are not the correct awareness that accepts duality.

original: gang las skyes pa yod ma lags //
analyzed: gang las skyes pa yod ma lags //
translated: From what is born, there is no birth,

original: de la mya ngan 'das gang yod //
analyzed: de la mya ngan 'das gang yod //
translated: And what is there that is nirvana?

original: sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bas na //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i glang po 'dra bas na //
translated: Since it is like an illusory elephant,

original: don du gzod nas zhi ba nyid //
analyzed: don du gzod nas zhi ba nyid //
translated: In reality, it is primordially peace.

original: skyes pa nyid na'ang ma skyes pa //
analyzed: skyes pa nyid na'ang ma skyes pa //
translated: Even when born, it is unborn,

original: sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin bzhed //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i glang po ji bzhin bzhed //
translated: Like an illusory elephant.

original: de bzhin thams cad skyes @78a * //
analyzed: de bzhin thams cad skyes @78a * //
translated: Thus, all things are either born

original: pa'am ; / yang dag par ni ma skyes lags //
analyzed: pa'am ; / yang dag par ni ma skyes lags //
translated: Or truly unborn.

original: 'jig rten mgon po dpag med kyis //🔽sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten mgon po dpag med kyis // sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa //
translated: The limitless lords of the world🔽Have individually brought countless sentient beings

original: so sor mya ngan 'das mdzad kyang //
analyzed: so sor mya ngan 'das mdzad kyang //
translated: To nirvana,

original: de dag gis kyang gad ma bkrol //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang gad ma bkrol //
translated: But they have not liberated even one.

original: thub chen gang phyir sems can rnams //
analyzed: thub chen gang phyir sems can rnams //
translated: The Great Sage has said that sentient beings

original: rang las ma skyes de yi phyir ;🔽/ gang yang gang gis ma bkrol zhes //
analyzed: rang las ma skyes de yi phyir ; / gang yang gang gis ma bkrol zhes //
translated: Are not born from themselves.🔽And you have clearly stated

original: de skad khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs //
analyzed: de skad khyod kyis gsal bar gsungs //
translated: That nothing is liberated by itself.🔽Just as an illusion is created

original: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis byas //
analyzed: ji ltar sgyu ma mkhan gyis byas //
translated: By a magician,

original: dngos po stong pa de bzhin du //🔽byas pa thams cad dngos stong gzhan //
analyzed: dngos po stong pa de bzhin du // byas pa thams cad dngos stong gzhan //
translated: So all things are empty of reality.

original: khyod gsung de bzhin byed pa po //
analyzed: khyod gsung de bzhin byed pa po //
translated: You have said that the creator

original: byed pa po yang gzhan gyis bgyis //
analyzed: byed pa po yang gzhan gyis bgyis //
translated: Is also created by another.🔽But if the creator is created by another,

original: byas pa can du 'gyur ba lags //
analyzed: byas pa can du 'gyur ba lags //
translated: Then the creator would be created.

original: yang na de yi bya ba byed //
analyzed: yang na de yi bya ba byed //
translated: Or else, if it creates the creator,

original: byed pa por ni thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: byed pa por ni thal bar 'gyur //
translated: The creator would be a consequence.🔽You have praised and taught

original: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam zhes //🔽khyod kyis gsang ni bstod de gsungs //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ming tsam zhes // khyod kyis gsang ni bstod de gsungs //
translated: That all of these are mere names.

original: brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa //
analyzed: brjod pa las ni gzhan gyur pa //
translated: Apart from what is expressed,

original: brjod par bgyi ba yod ma mchis //🔽de phyir chos rnams thams cad ni //
analyzed: brjod par bgyi ba yod ma mchis // de phyir chos rnams thams cad ni //
translated: There is no object of expression.🔽Therefore you have taught

original: rtog pa tsam zhes khyod kyis gsungs //🔽gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i //
analyzed: rtog pa tsam zhes khyod kyis gsungs // gang gis stong par rnam rtog pa'i //
translated: That all phenomena are mere conceptualization.🔽You have also taught that conceptualization,

original: rtog pa yang ni med ces gsungs //
analyzed: rtog pa yang ni med ces gsungs //
translated: Which conceives of emptiness, does not exist.

original: dngos dang dngos med gnyis 'das pa //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med gnyis 'das pa //
translated: Transcends both entity and nonentity,

original: la lar ma 'das pa yang lags //
analyzed: la lar ma 'das pa yang lags //
translated: And in some places, does not transcend.

original: shes pa med cing shes bya'ang med //
analyzed: shes pa med cing shes bya'ang med //
translated: It is neither consciousness nor the object of consciousness,🔽Nor is it nonexistent or existent,

original: med min yod min gang lags dang // gang yang gcig min du ma'ang min //
analyzed: med min yod min gang lags dang // gang yang gcig min du ma'ang min //
translated: Nor is it one or many,

original: gnyis ka ma yin ci yang med //
analyzed: gnyis ka ma yin ci yang med //
translated: Nor is it both, nor is it nothing at all.🔽It is groundless, unclear,🔽Inconceivable, without example,🔽Neither arising nor ceasing,

original: gzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang // bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang // gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dang // tshad pa med cing rtag med pa //
analyzed: gzhi med pa dang mi gsal dang // bsam mi khyab dang dpe med dang // gang yang mi skye mi 'gag dang // tshad pa med cing rtag med pa //
translated: Not permanent, nor impermanent,

original: de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba lags //
analyzed: de ni nam mkha' 'dra ba lags //
translated: Like space.

original: yi ge ye shes spyod yul min //
analyzed: yi ge ye shes spyod yul min //
translated: It is not the domain of the wisdom of letters,

original: de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
analyzed: de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung //
translated: It is dependently originated,

original: de ni stong par khyod bzhed lags //
analyzed: de ni stong par khyod bzhed lags //
translated: And you assert it to be emptiness.

original: dam pa'i chos kyang de lta bu //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyang de lta bu //
translated: The sublime Dharma is also like that,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang mtshungs //🔽de ni de nyid don dang ni //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de dang mtshungs // de ni de nyid don dang ni //
translated: And the Tathagata is the same.🔽It is asserted to be the meaning of reality,

original: de bzhin nyid dang rdzas su bzher //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang rdzas su bzher //
translated: Suchness, and the substantial.

original: de ni yang dag mi slu ba //
analyzed: de ni yang dag mi slu ba //
translated: It is true and nondeceptive,

original: de rdzogs pas na sangs rgyas brjod //
analyzed: de rdzogs pas na sangs rgyas brjod //
translated: And by perfecting it, one is called a Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas rnams dang chos dbyings dang // des na don du tha mi dad //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams dang chos dbyings dang // des na don du tha mi dad //
translated: And the dharmadhātu are not different in meaning.

original: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams dang // des na mnyam par khyod bzhed lags //
analyzed: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams dang // des na mnyam par khyod bzhed lags //
translated: Therefore, you accept that self and others are the same.

original: dngos po rnams las stong gzhan min //
analyzed: dngos po rnams las stong gzhan min //
translated: Emptiness is not different from things.

original: de med par yang dngos po med //🔽de phyir rten cing 'byung ba'i dngos //
analyzed: de med par yang dngos po med // de phyir rten cing 'byung ba'i dngos //
translated: Without it, things would not exist.🔽Therefore, you have taught that dependently arisen things

original: stong pa lags par @78b khyod kyis bstan //
analyzed: stong pa lags par @78b khyod kyis bstan //
translated: Are empty.

original: rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ang lags //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'ang lags //
translated: They arise from causes and conditions.

original: gzhan gyi dbang las kun rdzob ste //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang las kun rdzob ste //
translated: The relative is dependent on other things,

original: gzhan gyi dbang zhes rab tu gsungs //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang zhes rab tu gsungs //
translated: And you have taught that it is dependent.

original: dam pa'i don ni bcos ma yin //
analyzed: dam pa'i don ni bcos ma yin //
translated: The ultimate is not fabricated.🔽It is the essence, the nature,

original: ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin dang // yang dag rdzas dngos yod pa'ang lags //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin dang // yang dag rdzas dngos yod pa'ang lags //
translated: The real, the substantial, and the existent.

original: brtags pa'i dngos po med pa nyid //
analyzed: brtags pa'i dngos po med pa nyid //
translated: The imputed thing is nonexistence.

original: gzhan gyi dbang ni yod ma lags //🔽brtags pa'i dngos po yod ces pa //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang ni yod ma lags // brtags pa'i dngos po yod ces pa //
translated: The dependent thing does not exist.🔽You have taught that the imputed thing exists

original: sgro 'dogs lags par khyod kyis gsungs //
analyzed: sgro 'dogs lags par khyod kyis gsungs //
translated: And that this is superimposition.

original: byas pa chad nas med ces pa //
analyzed: byas pa chad nas med ces pa //
translated: You have taught that the cessation of production

original: chad pa lags par khyod kyis gsungs //
analyzed: chad pa lags par khyod kyis gsungs //
translated: You have taught that it is annihilated.

original: yang dag shes pas chad pa med //
analyzed: yang dag shes pas chad pa med //
translated: “It is not annihilated through right knowledge,

original: rtag pa nyid kyang med par bshad //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyang med par bshad //
translated: And it is taught that it is not permanent.

original: 'gro ba dngos pos stong pa lags //
analyzed: 'gro ba dngos pos stong pa lags //
translated: The world is empty of entities,

original: de slad smig rgyu 'dra bar bzhed //
analyzed: de slad smig rgyu 'dra bar bzhed //
translated: And therefore it is said to be like a mirage.

original: ji ltar ri dags skom chu ni //
analyzed: ji ltar ri dags skom chu ni //
translated: “Just as a thirsty deer

original: chad med rtag pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: chad med rtag pa yod ma yin //
translated: Is not permanently without water,

original: de bzhin 'gro ba thams cad kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin 'gro ba thams cad kyang //
translated: In the same way, all beings

original: chad med rtag pa med par gsungs //
analyzed: chad med rtag pa med par gsungs //
translated: Are taught to be not permanently annihilated.

original: gang la rdzas shig skye 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang la rdzas shig skye 'gyur ba //
translated: “Whatever is produced from a substance

original: de la chad sogs 'jig pa 'byung //
analyzed: de la chad sogs 'jig pa 'byung //
translated: Will be destroyed by the absence of that substance.🔽The world will have an end,

original: de la 'jig rten mtha' yod dang // mtha' med par yang 'gyur ba lags //🔽shes pa yod pas shes bya bzhin //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten mtha' yod dang // mtha' med par yang 'gyur ba lags // shes pa yod pas shes bya bzhin //
translated: And it will also be without end.

original: shes bya yod pas de shes bzhin //
analyzed: shes bya yod pas de shes bzhin //
translated: “Just as there is an object of knowledge because of the existence of knowledge,🔽And there is knowledge because of the existence of an object of knowledge,

original: gang tshe gnyis ka ma skyes par //
analyzed: gang tshe gnyis ka ma skyes par //
translated: When both are unproduced,

original: rtogs pa de tshe ci zhig yod //🔽de ltar sgyu ma la sogs dpe //
analyzed: rtogs pa de tshe ci zhig yod // de ltar sgyu ma la sogs dpe //
translated: What is there to be realized?🔽“Thus, the supreme physician

original: sman pa'i mchog gis gsal bstan nas ;
analyzed: sman pa'i mchog gis gsal bstan nas ;
translated: Has clearly taught the examples of illusions and so forth,

original: / lta ba thams cad 'gog byed pa'i //
analyzed: / lta ba thams cad 'gog byed pa'i //
translated: In order to stop all views.

original: dam pa'i chos ni bstan pa lags //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni bstan pa lags //
translated: Is the teaching of the sacred Dharma.

original: ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa //
analyzed: ngo bo med pa nyid bstan pa //
translated: The teaching of the absence of entityness

original: de ni yang dag dam pa lags //
analyzed: de ni yang dag dam pa lags //
translated: Is the true and ultimate.

original: dngos po'i gdon gyis zin rnams kyis //
analyzed: dngos po'i gdon gyis zin rnams kyis //
translated: For those who are seized by the demon of entities,

original: gso ba de ni bla na med //
analyzed: gso ba de ni bla na med //
translated: It is the unsurpassed healing.

original: des na chos kyi mchod sbyin pa //
analyzed: des na chos kyi mchod sbyin pa //
translated: Therefore, the offering of the Dharma

original: mchod sbyin rim pas rtag rgyun du //
analyzed: mchod sbyin rim pas rtag rgyun du //
translated: Is the constant and continuous

original: 'jig rten gsum po sbyin sreg mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum po sbyin sreg mdzad //
translated: Sacrifice of the three worlds.

original: dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bgyid cing //
analyzed: dngos 'dzin 'jigs pa gcod bgyid cing //
translated: It severs the fear of grasping at entities

original: mu stegs ri dags 'jigs bgyid pa //
analyzed: mu stegs ri dags 'jigs bgyid pa //
translated: And terrifies the tīrthika deer.

original: bdag med seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra //
analyzed: bdag med seng ge'i nga ro'i sgra //
translated: The lion’s roar of selflessness

original: rmad byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs //
analyzed: rmad byung de ni khyod kyis gsungs //
translated: Is the marvelous sound you have spoken.🔽You have beaten the great Dharma drum

original: stong pa nyid dang ches zab pa'i //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang ches zab pa'i //
translated: Of emptiness and the profound.

original: chos kyi rnga chen brdungs pa lags //
analyzed: chos kyi rnga chen brdungs pa lags //
translated: You have blown the great Dharma conch

original: ngo bo nyid med sgra bo che'i //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med sgra bo che'i //
translated: Of the loud sound of the absence of entityness.

original: chos kyi dung ni bus pa lags //
analyzed: chos kyi dung ni bus pa lags //
translated: You have taught the Dharma substance

original: sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yi //🔽chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags //🔽chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bstan pa bdud rtsi yi // chos kyi rdzas ni gsungs pa lags // chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
translated: Of the nectar of the Buddha’s teaching.🔽You have also taught the nature

original: nges pa'i don to zhes kyang bstan //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes kyang bstan //
translated: Of all phenomena to be the definitive meaning.

original: gang yang skye dang 'gag la sogs //
analyzed: gang yang skye dang 'gag la sogs //
translated: And also arising, ceasing, and so forth,

original: sems can srog la sogs bstan pa //
analyzed: sems can srog la sogs bstan pa //
translated: And the teaching of sentient beings, life force, and so on,

original: @79a * // de ni bkri don kun rdzob tu //
analyzed: @79a * // de ni bkri don kun rdzob tu //
translated: That is the provisional meaning,

original: mgon po khyod kyis bstan pa lags //
analyzed: mgon po khyod kyis bstan pa lags //
translated: Taught by you, protector.🔽You who have gone to the other shore

original: shes rab pha rol phyin mtsho yi //🔽pha rol gang gis rang phyin te //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin mtsho yi // pha rol gang gis rang phyin te //
translated: Of the ocean of the perfection of wisdom,🔽You who are rich with the jewels of merit and qualities,

original: bsod nams yon tan rin chen phyug / mgon khyod yon tan pha rol phyin //
analyzed: bsod nams yon tan rin chen phyug / mgon khyod yon tan pha rol phyin //
translated: Protector, you have gone to the other shore of qualities.

original: de ltar dpe med bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: de ltar dpe med bsam mi khyab //
translated: Thus, incomparable, inconceivable,

original: 'gro ba'i mgon po bstod pa yis //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i mgon po bstod pa yis //
translated: By praising the protector of beings,

original: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
analyzed: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des //
translated: Whatever merit I have obtained by that,🔽May beings become equal to you.

original: 'gro ba khyod dang mtshungs par shog / bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: 'gro ba khyod dang mtshungs par shog / bsam gyis mi khyab par bstod pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise of the inconceivable composed by the great master Nagarjuna is complete.
